name: Selle Italia Novus Boost Superflow L3 Saddle - Unisex
description: The right saddle makes a world of difference. With a large central hole, this performance saddle relieves pressure on endurance or high-output rides.Large central hole reduces pressure and improves comfort.Recommended for riders with high pelvic rotation.Wide sit width.Dual-density padding for cushioning and dampening.Perforated synthetic cover.7mm manganese rails.
